General.Name: Rusgrain Holding OAO
General.Description: Public Joint-Stock Company Rusgrain Holding cultivates, processes, stores, and trades in agricultural products in Russia and internationally. It offers a range of agricultural products, such as poultry products, dairy products, and cereals. The company also operates poultry farms; processes poultry meat in sausages, smoked meats, delicacies, and semi-finished products; and offers chicken eggs and broiler meat. It operates under the Avdon and Turbaslinsky Broiler brand names. In addition, the company produces and supplies balanced feed to poultry farms. Public Joint-Stock Company Rusgrain Holding was founded in 2004 and is based in Ufa, Russia.

1.Name: Mr. Ali  Darchiev
1.Title: Member of the Board of Directors
